reviewText:
Nothing much to say really other than for Therapy? fans this is beyond cool!!

For people who've never heard of this Irish band you're hardly likely to buy this but if you like alternative/hard rock/metal-punk then this band would 'love' to hear from you:)*

Features a full concert from Dublin.
11 Music Videos
Backstage Footage
Q&A session with the band

*'Troublegum' is their best album by the way ;)
